page.title: 05MRS MILLS
page.content: MRS MILLS IS 88 YEARS OF AGE.HER GRANDFATHER KEPT THE CROWN.HER FATHER WAS A BREWER.SHE USED TO LIVE IN PINCOTS LANE WHEN SHE WAS YOUNG.SHE BORROWED THE MILK CHURN FROM THE MILKMAN ON SUNDAYS.AT SCHOOL IN THE MORNINGS THEY STUDIED MATHS,WRITING, HISTORY,READING AND GEOGRAPHY.IN THE AFTERNOON WAS SEWING,SCIENCE AND DRAWING.SHE WAS THE WORST WRITER THE RE AND HAD SPOTS OF INK ALL OVER HER PAPER.BEHIND THE BUTHAY CAR PARK WAS A FIELD WHERE MOST ENTERTAINMENT WAS SUCH AS FLOWER SHOWS AND OTHER THINGS .WHEN SHE LEFT SCHOOL SHE WENT INTO SERVICE HER HUSBAND WAS IN THE NAVY. WHEN HE WENT TO WORK IN THE QUARRY HE COULD NOT FIT IN SO HE WENT BACK IN THE NAVY.SHE HAD TWO POUNDS TO LOOK AFTER HER FAMILY.NOW SHE LIVES IN THE BUTHAY,WICKWAR.
